## Example of cache

This chunk is called "Chunk-1". 

```{r Chunk-1, cache = cache}
sub.tmp <- cars[1:20, ]
```


\bigskip

The chunk option is set to *cache = TRUE*. 

```{r Chunk-2, cache = fig.cache}
plot(sub.tmp)
```



\bigskip

The chunk option is set to *cache = TRUE, dependson = "Chunk-1"*. 

```{r Chunk-3, cache = fig.cache, dependson="Chunk-1"}
plot(sub.tmp)
```
